summary: Simple mod that gives female\'s henna tattoo\'s on the top\'s of their feet as well as dirt on the bottoms.
descriptionHtml: Ok, so this is an incredibly simple mod and my first. I read through etiquette and what-not and sincerely hope I didnt do anything wrong. I use the UNP body so I simply uploaded that to Photoshop and added the dirt and tattoo\'s. I dont think it will adversely effect any other mods. I have close to 100 installed and its not screwing with anything, although every female character in the game will have the same tat\'s and dirt on her heels. Most NPC\'s wear boots so I didnt really think it would be a problem. Install by dropping the file into Data/ textures/ actors/ character/ female. I have no clue yet how to set it up for NMM so...forgive me. Again, first mod ever. Id suggest making a backup of your original file just in case.
author: Vargre
